title: My last pony ride
content: I was nine. I was trying to feed the beast for five minutes but it was angry for an unknown reason. Suddently it jumped me, kicking me in the thigh with his hoof. I had never felt more scared in my life, and i never agreed to get back on a horse back ever again. I took a hot chocolate back home with my grandma.

title: My first pony ride
content: I was four. I had never felt more alive in my life, the wind blew across my hair as the poney was trotting. I took a hot chocolate back home with my grandma.
